ygData.subject: Here we go again.  Another bot to join.
ygData.msgSnippet: In the beginning, the pod crashed to earth.  Then the pod opened and out stepped a bot.  This bot was unlike some of the other bots. This bot was different.

In the beginning, the pod crashed to earth.  Then the pod opened and 
out stepped a bot.  This bot was unlike some of the other bots. This 
bot was different. Like most bots, she had a spark, a body and a 
mind that wished to learn.  She was curious. Curious about her new 
world and about her new surroundings.  This bot that looked at the 
new world was somewhat new herself.  She was a small bot about 3 
foot high in bot mode and about 2 foot in beast mode.  She wasn't 
programmed for either maximal or predacon.  She was neutral for the 
moment.  Her small body was somewhat childlike. For indeed she was 
just that, a child.  Her form in beast mode was that of a small 
fox.  She walked out of the pod and walked around her new planet. 
Her program was that to find out all she could about her 
surroundinsgs and all she could about everything she encountered. 
She walked away from the pod and started exploring.  She forest 
around her was teaming with life.  She started counting the flowers 
and trees. She started watching the birds flying above her.  She 
stopped for a moment and looked at a bunny chewing on a clump of 
grass. "Hi there little fella. My name is Cam. What's yours?"  The 
bunny got frightened and hopped off. "Gee, I just wanted to be 
friends or something. I wasn't going to hurt you, you, what ever you 
are." she said as the bunny hopped off into the forest.  Cam just 
walked along the path and just followed her curiosity.
